resources.string: Notification permission needed to receive app notifications. \n\nGrant notification permission
App only works correctly if it can access your location.\n\nGrant location permission
Your location/GPS setting must be turned on for the app to work.\n\nTurn on location/GPS
Turn off Battery Optimization for the app to work properly, This wont affect your other apps.\n\nTurn off battery optimization
This app needs Auto start permission to proceed. Grant Auto start permission
App only works correctly if it can always access your location.\n\nPlease select \"allow all the time\" to continue
Allow access to phone state for network signal.\n\nTurn on Phone State
Allow access to call logs .\n\nTurn on Read Call Log
Allow access to read SMS .\n\nTurn on Read SMS
Allow to schedule Exact Alarm .\n\nAllow Exact Alarm Schedule
Allow access to Accessibility .\n\nTurn on Accessibility Permission
